animeTitle: Kakyuusei 2: Hitomi no Naka no Shoujo-tachi
animeDescription: Many people have fond memories of meeting a certain teenage boy in their younger years. However, their ages vary widely, and each remembers him as a teen. This story follows the intricate intertwining of their various stories and how this young man, who apparently lives outside of time, has affected each of them.
animeRelated: ['Alternative setting: Elf-ban Kakyuusei: Anata dake wo Mitsumete...', 'Sequel: Kakyuusei 2: Anthology']
